item.title: Parent/child theme
item.description: Parent/child theme PrestaShop 1.7 relies a lot on template inheritance in order to create the most consistent theme possible while heavily reducing the amount of duplicated code. We took it even further introducing the Parent Child theme feature. The point to is to avoid modifying the main theme so you can update it! This feature is only useful if you want to slightly modify a theme (to add a block for example).
